greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular Toeplitz matrix with A078008 in every column.
comment: A triangle formed like Pascal's triangle, but with 3^n n>=0 on the left border instead of 1. - _Boris Putievskiy_, Aug 19 2013
formula: A007318 * an infinite lower triangular Toeplitz matrix with A078008 in every column: (1, 0, 2, 2, 6, 10, 22, 42, 86,...).
Closed-form formula for arbitrary left and right borders of Pascal like triangle see A228196. - _Boris Putievskiy_, Aug 19 2013
